00036 #define LONG_MAX       2147483647 /* 2^31 - 1 */
00037 
00045 #define MIJ(m,i,j)     m.elements[(i) * m.cols + (j)]
00046 
00058 #define MI(m,i)        m.elements[i]
00059 
00064 struct Matrix
00065 {
00066     long elements[]; 
00067     int rows;        
00068     int cols;        
00069     int size;        
00070 };
00071 
00076 void MatrixInit(Matrix &matrix, int rows, int cols)
00077 {
00078     matrix.rows = rows;
00079     matrix.cols = cols;
00080     matrix.size = rows * cols;
00081     ArrayInit(matrix.elements, 0, matrix.size);
00082 }
00083 
00091 void MatrixInitElements(Matrix &matrix, int rows, int cols, long &elements[])
00092 {
00093     matrix.rows = rows;
00094     matrix.cols = cols;
00095     matrix.size = rows * cols;
00096     ArrayBuild(matrix.elements, elements);
00097 }
00098 
00104 void MatrixInitIdentity(Matrix &matrix, int rows, int cols)
00105 {
00106     matrix.rows = rows;
00107     matrix.cols = cols;
00108     matrix.size = rows * cols;
00109     ArrayInit(matrix.elements, 0, matrix.size);
00110     for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < rows; i++, j++)
00111         matrix.elements[i * cols + j] = 1;
00112 }
00113 
00119 void MatrixInitDiagonal(Matrix &matrix, int rows, int cols, long value)
00120 {
00121     matrix.rows = rows;
00122     matrix.cols = cols;
00123     matrix.size = rows * cols;
00124     ArrayInit(matrix.elements, 0, matrix.size);
00125     for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < rows; i++, j++)
00126         matrix.elements[i * cols + j] = value;
00127 }
00128 
00133 inline long MatrixGet(Matrix &matrix, int row, int col)
00134 {
00135     return matrix.elements[matrix.cols * row + col];
00136 }
00137 
00142 inline void MatrixSet(Matrix &matrix, int row, int col, long value)
00143 {
00144     matrix.elements[matrix.cols * row + col] = value;
00145 }
00146 
00152 bool MatrixCompare (Matrix &matrixA, Matrix &matrixB)
00153 {
00154     if (matrixA.rows != matrixB.rows || matrixA.cols != matrixB.cols)
00155         return false;
00156 
00157     for (int i = 0; i < matrixA.size; i++)
00158        if (MI(matrixA, i) != MI(matrixB, i))
00159            return false;
00160     return true;
00161 }
00162 
00166 bool MatrixIsNull (Matrix &matrix)
00167 {
00168     long flag;
00169     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00170          flag |= MI(matrix, i);
00171     if (flag) return false;
00172     return true;
00173 }
00174 
00179 void MatrixTranspose (Matrix &matrix)
00180 {
00181     ASSERT(matrix.rows == matrix.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00182     
00183     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.rows; i++)
00184         for (int j = i; j < matrix.cols; j++)
00185             if (i != j)
00186             {
00187                 long tmp1 = MatrixGet(matrix, i, j);
00188                 long tmp2 = MatrixGet(matrix, j, i);
00189                 MatrixSet(matrix, i, j, tmp2);
00190                 MatrixSet(matrix, j, i, tmp1);
00191             }
00192 }
00193 
00198 long MatrixMaxima (Matrix &matrix)
00199 {
00200     long maxima = 0;
00201     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00202     {
00203         long element = Abs(MI(matrix, i));
00204         if (element > maxima)
00205             maxima = element;
00206     }
00207     return maxima;
00208 }
00209 
00215 long MatrixMinima (Matrix &matrix)
00216 {
00217     long minima = LONG_MAX;
00218     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00219     {
00220         long element = Abs(MI(matrix, i));
00221         if (element && element < minima)
00222             minima = element;
00223      }
00224      return minima;
00225 }
00226 
00230 inline void MatrixShiftLeft (Matrix &matrix, int numShift)
00231 {
00232     if (numShift)
00233         for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00234             MI(matrix, i) <<= numShift;
00235 }
00236 
00240 inline void MatrixShiftRight (Matrix &matrix, int numShift)
00241 {
00242     if (numShift)
00243         for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00244             MI(matrix, i) >>= numShift;
00245 }
00246 
00250 inline void MatrixAdd (Matrix &matrixA, Matrix &matrixB)
00251 {
00252     ASSERT(matrixA.rows == matrixB.rows && matrixB.cols == matrixB.cols,
00253            "Matrix Addtion invalid size");
00254 
00255     for (int i = 0; i < matrixA.size; i++)
00256         MI(matrixA, i) = MI(matrixA, i) + MI(matrixB, i);
00257 }
00258 
00262 inline void MatrixSubtract (Matrix &matrixA, Matrix &matrixB)
00263 {
00264     ASSERT(matrixA.rows == matrixB.rows && matrixB.cols == matrixB.cols,
00265            "Matrix Addtion invalid size");
00266 
00267     for (int i = 0; i < matrixA.size; i++)
00268         MI(matrixA, i) = MI(matrixA, i) - MI(matrixB, i);
00269 }
00270 
00276 void MatrixMultiply (Matrix &matrixA, Matrix &matrixB, Matrix &matrixC)
00277 {
00278     ASSERT(matrixA.cols == matrixB.rows, "Mismatch matrix sizes");
00279 
00280     MatrixInit(matrixC, matrixA.rows, matrixB.cols);
00281     for (int i = 0; i < matrixA.rows; i++)
00282         for (int j = 0; j < matrixB.cols; j++)
00283             for (int k = 0; k < matrixA.cols; k++)
00284                 MatrixSet(matrixC, i, j, (MatrixGet(matrixC, i, j) +
00285                           MatrixGet(matrixA, i, k) * MatrixGet(matrixB, k, j)));
00286 }
00287 
00292 inline void MatrixScale (Matrix &matrix, long scale)
00293 {
00294     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00295         MI(matrix, i) *= scale;
00296 }
00297 
00301 inline void MatrixReduce (Matrix &matrix, long scale)
00302 {
00303     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.size; i++)
00304         MI(matrix, i) /= scale;
00305 }
00306 
00312 void MatrixMinor(Matrix &matrix, int minorI, int minorJ, Matrix &matrixM)
00313 {
00314     int mI = 0, mJ = 0;
00315 
00316     ASSERT(matrix.rows == matrix.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00317     ASSERT(matrix.rows > 1, "Matrix is not > 1x1");
00318 
00319     MatrixInit(matrixM, matrix.rows - 1, matrix.cols - 1);
00320     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.rows; i++)
00321     {
00322         if (i == minorI) continue;
00323         for (int j = 0; j < matrix.cols; j++)
00324         {
00325             if (j == minorJ) continue;
00326             MatrixSet(matrixM, mI, mJ, MatrixGet(matrix, i, j));
00327             mJ++;
00328         }
00329         mJ = 0;
00330         mI++;
00331     }
00332 }
00333 
00338 long MatrixDeterminant3(Matrix &matrix)
00339 {
00340     ASSERT(matrix.rows == matrix.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00341     ASSERT(matrix.rows > 0 && matrix.rows <= 3, "Invalid matrix size");
00342     
00343     if (matrix.rows == 1)
00344         return MI(matrix, 0);
00345     if (matrix.rows == 2)
00346         return MI(matrix, 0) * MI(matrix, 3) - MI(matrix, 2) * MI(matrix, 1);
00347     return
00348         MI(matrix, 0) * MI(matrix, 4) * MI(matrix, 8) -
00349         MI(matrix, 0) * MI(matrix, 5) * MI(matrix, 7) -
00350         MI(matrix, 1) * MI(matrix, 3) * MI(matrix, 8) +
00351         MI(matrix, 1) * MI(matrix, 5) * MI(matrix, 6) +
00352         MI(matrix, 2) * MI(matrix, 3) * MI(matrix, 7) -
00353         MI(matrix, 2) * MI(matrix, 4) * MI(matrix, 6) ;
00354 }
00355 
00366 long MatrixCofactorIJ (Matrix &matrixIn, int i, int j)
00367 {
00368     struct RecurseData
00369     {
00370         int i; int j; /* Inputs to the frame */
00371         long minorDet; int x; int flip; int row; /* Intermediate variables in frame */
00372         long cofactorIJ; /* Output from the frame */
00373     };
00374     RecurseData stack[10];
00375     RecurseData frame;
00376     
00377     /* Separate stack for matrices because NXC doesn't seem to work
00378      * with array of struct of struct so can't use RecurseData for them.
00379      */
00380     Matrix matrixStack[];
00381     Matrix minor, matrix;
00382 
00383     ASSERT(matrixIn.rows == matrixIn.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00384     ASSERT(matrixIn.rows >= 1, "Matrix is not >= 1x1");
00385     if (matrixIn.rows == 1)
00386         return 1;
00387 
00388     int l = 0;
00389     /* Depth of the recursion tree is N */
00390     ArrayInit(stack, frame, matrixIn.rows);
00391     ArrayInit(matrixStack, matrix, matrixIn.rows);
00392 
00393     /* Set frame 0 */
00394     frame.i = i;
00395     frame.j = j;
00396     stack[0] = frame;
00397     matrixStack[0] = matrixIn;
00398     matrix = matrixIn; //matrixStack[l];
00399 
00400 recurseEnter:
00401     /* C(i,j) = (-1)^(i+j) |M(i,j)| */
00402 
00403     frame.minorDet = 0;
00404 
00405     /* flip = (-1)^(i + j) */
00406     if ((frame.i + frame.j) & 1) frame.flip = -1;
00407     else frame.flip = 1;
00408     
00409     /* Get Minor(i,j) */
00410     MatrixMinor(matrix, frame.i, frame.j, minor);
00411     
00412     /* Compute minor determinant |M| */
00413     if (minor.rows < 4)
00414     {
00415         frame.minorDet = MatrixDeterminant3(minor);
00416     }
00417     else
00418     {
00419         /* |M| = m(0,1) * Cm(0,1) + m(0,2) * Cm(0,2) + .. + m(0,n) * Cm(0,n) */
00420         for (frame.row = 0; frame.row < minor.rows; frame.row++)
00421         {
00422             frame.x = MatrixGet(minor, 0, frame.row);
00423             
00424             /* Push frame: Prepare for recursion. */
00425             stack[l] = frame;
00426             int rowSave = frame.row;
00427             /* Push end */
00428 
00429             /* Set next frame */
00430             l++;
00431             frame.i = 0;
00432             frame.j = rowSave;
00433             matrixStack[l] = minor;
00434             matrix = minor;
00435 
00436             goto recurseEnter;
00437             /* Doing: retCofactorIJ = MatrixCofactorIJ(minor, 0, row) */
00438             
00439 recurseExit:
00440             /* Result of last frame */
00441             long retCofactorIJ = frame.cofactorIJ;
00442             minor = matrixStack[l];
00443             
00444             /* Pop frame from stack */
00445             l--;
00446             matrix = matrixStack[l];
00447             frame = stack[l];
00448             /* Pop end */
00449             
00450             frame.minorDet += frame.x * retCofactorIJ;
00451         }
00452     }
00453     frame.cofactorIJ = frame.minorDet * frame.flip;
00454     if (l > 0) goto recurseExit;
00455     return frame.cofactorIJ;
00456 }
00457 
00461 void MatrixCofactor (Matrix &matrix, Matrix &retCofactor)
00462 {
00463     ASSERT(matrix.rows == matrix.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00464     ASSERT(matrix.rows >= 1, "Matrix size is not >= 1x1");
00465 
00466     MatrixInit(retCofactor, matrix.rows, matrix.cols);
00467     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.rows; i++)
00468         for (int j = 0; j < matrix.cols; j++)
00469         {
00470             long cofac = MatrixCofactorIJ(matrix, i, j);
00471             MatrixSet(retCofactor, i, j, cofac);
00472         }
00473 }
00474 
00485 long MatrixDeterminant (Matrix &matrix)
00486 {
00487     if (matrix.rows < 4)
00488         return MatrixDeterminant3(matrix);
00489 
00490     ASSERT(matrix.rows == matrix.cols, "Matrix is not square");
00491 
00492     /* |A| = a(0,1) * C(0,1) + a(0,2) * C(0,2) + ... + a(0,n) * C(0,n) */
00493 
00494     long det = 0;
00495     for (int i = 0; i < matrix.rows; i++)
00496         det += MatrixGet(matrix, 0, i) * MatrixCofactorIJ(matrix, 0, i);
00497     return det;
00498 }
00499 
00504 void MatrixAdjugate (Matrix &matrix, Matrix &retAdjugate)
00505 {
00506      MatrixCofactor(matrix, retAdjugate);
00507      MatrixTranspose(retAdjugate);
00508 }
00509 
00514 void MatrixPrint (Matrix &matrix, string title, int pauseSecs)
00515 {
00516     ClearScreen();
00517     TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "----------------------");
00518     TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, title);
00519     for (int i = 1; i <= matrix.rows; i++)
00520         for (int j = 0; j < matrix.cols; j++)
00521             NumOut(30 * j, 63 - (8 * i), MatrixGet(matrix, i - 1, j), false);
00522     if (pauseSecs > 0)
00523         Wait(1000 * pauseSecs);
00524 }
00525 
00526 inline bool checkMultiplyOverflow(long a, long b)
00527 {
00528      while (a > 0) {a <<= 1; b >>= 1;}
00529      if (b) /* overflow */
00530          return true;
00531      return false;
00532 }
00533 
00554 long MatrixInverse (Matrix matrix, long precision, Matrix &retInverse)
00555 {
00556      ASSERT(matrix.rows > 0, "Matrix invalid size");
00557      ASSERT(precision > 0, "Invalid precision");
00558 
00599      long retScale = precision;
00600      
00601      /* Determine dynamic range of the input matrix */
00602      long maxima = MatrixMaxima(matrix);
00603      long dynamicRange = 1;
00604      dynamicRange <<= (31/matrix.rows);
00605      dynamicRange--;   /* 2^(31/N) - 1 */
00606 
00607      /* Reduce the input to fit in above dynamic range */
00608      int shiftCount = 0;
00609      while (maxima > dynamicRange) { maxima >>= 1; shiftCount++; }
00610      MatrixShiftRight(matrix, shiftCount);
00611 
00612      /* Find matrix adjugate and determinant for computing inverse. */
00613      MatrixAdjugate(matrix, retInverse);
00614      long det = MatrixDeterminant(matrix);
00615      
00616      /* Neutralize the dynamic range adjustments: First try increasing
00617       * scale factor as much as it can hold and then the rest in the matrix.
00618       * We shift the precision right
00619       * (effectively, dividing it by 2 each time) until it is 1 and at
00620       * the same time decrease shiftCount for residual factor.
00621       */
00622      while (retScale >= 0 && shiftCount > 0)
00623          { retScale <<= 1; shiftCount--; }
00624      if (retScale < 0) { shiftCount++; retScale >>= 1; }
00625      if (shiftCount > 0) MatrixShiftRight(retInverse, shiftCount);
00626      
00627      /* Find the largest integer in matrix. */
00628      maxima = MatrixMaxima(retInverse);
00629      
00630      if (checkMultiplyOverflow(maxima, precision))
00631          det /= precision; /* Overflow detected: Apply the scale on det */
00632      else
00633          MatrixScale(retInverse, precision); /* No overflow */
00634      MatrixReduce(retInverse, det);
00635      return retScale;
00636 }

00764 void TestMatrix()
00765 {
00766     Matrix A, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, B, C, D, R, E, T;
00767     MatrixInitElements(A,  3, 3, elementsA);
00768     MatrixInitElements(A1, 1, 1, elementsA1);
00769     MatrixInitElements(A2, 2, 2, elementsA2);
00770     MatrixInitElements(A3, 3, 3, elementsA3);
00771     MatrixInitElements(A4, 4, 4, elementsA4);
00772     MatrixInitElements(A5, 5, 5, elementsA5);
00773     MatrixInitElements(B,  3, 3, elementsB);
00774     MatrixInitElements(C,  2, 3, elementsC);
00775     MatrixInitElements(D,  3, 2, elementsD);
00776 
00777     /* Test Transpose */
00778     MatrixTranspose(A);
00779     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsA_trans);
00780     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, A), "Matrix Transpose");
00781     //MatrixPrint(A);
00782     MatrixTranspose(A);
00783 
00784     /* Test Addition */
00785     R = A;
00786     MatrixAdd(R, B);
00787     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsAB_add);
00788     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Addition");
00789     //MatrixPrint(R);
00790 
00791     /* Test Subtraction */
00792     R = A;
00793     MatrixSubtract(R, B);
00794     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsAB_sub);
00795     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Subtraction");
00796     //MatrixPrint(R);
00797 
00798     /* Test Scaling */
00799     R = A;
00800     MatrixScale(R, 5);
00801     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsA_scale5);
00802     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Scaling");
00803     //MatrixPrint(R);
00804 
00805     /* Test Reduce */
00806     MatrixReduce(R, 5);
00807     TEST(MatrixCompare(A, R), "Matrix Reduction");
00808     //MatrixPrint(R);
00809 
00810     /* Test Multiply */
00811     MatrixMultiply(C, D, R);
00812     MatrixInitElements(E, 2, 2, r_elementsCD_multi);
00813     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Multiply");
00814     //MatrixPrint(R);
00815 
00816     /* Test Minor A(0,0) */
00817     MatrixMinor(A, 0, 0, R);
00818     MatrixInitElements(E, 2, 2, r_elementsA_minor00);
00819     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Minor 00");
00820     //MatrixPrint(R);
00821 
00822     /* Test Minor A(1,1) */
00823     MatrixMinor(A, 1, 1, R);
00824     MatrixInitElements(E, 2, 2, r_elementsA_minor11);
00825     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Minor 11");
00826     //MatrixPrint(R);
00827 
00828     /* Test Determinants */
00829     TEST((MatrixDeterminant(A1) == -3), "Matrix determinant");
00830     TEST((MatrixDeterminant(A2) == -10), "Matrix determinant");
00831     TEST((MatrixDeterminant(A3) == 18), "Matrix determinant");
00832 
00833     /* Test Cofactor (i,j) */
00834     TEST((MatrixCofactorIJ(A, 0, 0) == -8), "Matrix Cofac 00");
00835     TEST((MatrixCofactorIJ(A, 0, 1) == -5), "Matrix Cofac 01");
00836     TEST((MatrixCofactorIJ(A, 0, 2) ==  4), "Matrix Cofac 02");
00837 
00838     /* Test C(ij), Cofactor and Adjugate */
00839     MatrixAdjugate(A, R);
00840     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsA_adj);
00841     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Adjugate");
00842     //MatrixPrint(R);
00843 
00844     /* Test Inverse */
00845     long scale = MatrixInverse(A3, 1000, R);
00846     MatrixInitElements(E, 3, 3, r_elementsA3_inv);
00847     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Inverse");
00848     //MatrixPrint(R, "A3 Inv = ", 5);
00849 
00850 #if 0
00851     MatrixAdjugate(A4, R);
00852     MatrixInitElements(E, 4, 4, r_elementsA4_adj);
00853     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Adjugate");
00854     //MatrixPrint(R);
00855 
00856     MatrixAdjugate(A5, R);
00857     MatrixInitElements(E, 5, 5, r_elementsA5_adj);
00858     TEST(MatrixCompare(E, R), "Matrix Adjugate");
00859     //MatrixPrint(R);
00860 
00861     int tick1 = CurrentTick();
00862     for (int i = 0; i < 1; i++)
00863     {
00864         MatrixAdjugate(A, R);
00865     }
00866     int tick2 = CurrentTick();
00867     NumOut(0, LCD_LINE1, (tick2 - tick1), true);
00868     //MatrixPrint(R);
00869 #endif
00870 
00871     TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Matrix passed");
00872 }
